basicInfo.name: Faizan Wani
basicInfo.aboutMe:
I'm a Frontend Focused Web Developer building and managing the Front-end of Websites and Web Applications that leads to the success of the overall product. Check out some of my work in the Projects section. 
I also like sharing content related to the stuff that I have learned over the years in Web Development so it can help other people of the Dev Community. Feel free to Connect or Follow me on my Linkedin and Instagram where I post useful content related to Web Development and Programming 
I'm open to Job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience then don't hesitate to contact me.
basicInfo.description: Passionate frontend developer focused on crafting engaging user experiences and scalable web applications. Driven by creativity and a commitment to building high-quality products.

projects.title: Food Delivery App
projects.description: A web-based food delivery application that allows users to browse and order food from nearby restaurants.
contributions: Developed the user interface with React
Integrated geofencing for location-based restaurant suggestions
keyFeatures: Responsive design for mobile and desktop

challengesAndSolutions.challenge: Implementing geofencing to limit restaurant visibility based on location.
challengesAndSolutions.solution: Handled geofencing logic in Supabase for optimized performance and security.

media.altText: Screenshot of the food delivery app homepage
